title: The Swarm's Echo
description: Flushing the Vermintide revealed a strange, glowing tear in the fabric of the Undercity. A Chrono-Fracture. Time is flowing backwards near the pumping station.

turns.narrative: As you approach the fracture, the flushed Vermin are suddenly regurgitated from the water, running exactly backwards up the pipes.
turns.choice_a: Use Chronos-Magic to stabilize your own timeline
turns.consequence_a: You anchor yourself. You can fight normally while the rats move in erratic, predictable reverse patterns.
turns.consequence_b: Highly disorienting. You take several bites you couldn't see coming because the rats attack before they wind up.

turns.narrative: At the center of the fracture is a shattered piece of an hourglass. You must seal the rift.
turns.consequence_a: The rift closes violently, throwing you backwards and dealing moderate force damage.
turns.choice_b: Carefully recalibrate the shard into your own timepiece
turns.consequence_b: The rift seals seamlessly, and your timepiece gains the ability to briefly rewind minor mistakes.

rift_crushed.description: You violently closed the time rift.

rift_absorbed.description: You absorbed the Chrono-Shard and sealed the rift.

conclusion: You violently closed the time rift.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
